叔.definition: uncle; father's younger brother; husband's younger brother; Taiwan pr. [shu2]

叔伯.definition: (of cousins) descending from the same grandfather or great-grandfather

叔公.definition: great uncle; grandfather's younger brother; husband's father's younger brother

叔叔.definition: father's younger brother; uncle; Taiwan pr. [shu2 shu5]; CL:個|个[ge4]

叔婆.definition: aunt by marriage; husband's aunt; husband's father's younger brother's wife

叔母.definition: aunt; wife of father's younger brother

叔祖母.definition: wife of paternal grandfather's younger brother
